pr_title: REGISTRAR: Support editing submitted form by user

timeline.message:
REGISTRAR: Support editing submitted form by user

- Added updateFormItemsData() which will update form items
  data with new values by its IDs. Only application submitter
  can use this.
- Updating form items sets application state to NEW
  and starts verification and auto-approval if possible.
- Method updateFormItemData() used from old GUI is now
  marked as deprecated.

timeline.bodyText: Just a reminder that by calling only selfAuthorizedForApplication, PERUNADMIN will not be allowed to call this method. I suppose it is ok if the whole method will be used only for perun-wui, but it could be insufficient when for example NGUI would want to use it.
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the insight. Use-cases for admin gui are not yet defined, I'll let this to be decided once its needed.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: I think you should check here that all of the given data is for the given application. This would allow some users to change someone else's data.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: Should be fixed. Now we pass also application id in order to get form item data from the DB.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Check that form item belong to the application

- User could send faked form items data and update
  items of others. Now we check, that item belongs
  to the application, upon which we perform authorization.
